direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods interact with the Optional value but perform different operations (one checks presence, the other provides a string representation).
Both methods access the Optional value directly, though one returns the value and the other returns a string representation.
Both methods transform the Optional value, though one returns a string and the other returns a transformed Optional.

enhanced_by.reason: The constructor initializes the Optional value, which is used by the toString method.
Checking if the value is present can be part of the setup before invoking toString.
The get method can be used to assert the value before and after invoking toString.
